questions: Can you walk us through a recent project where you utilized your skills in Node.js?
How have you applied your knowledge of C# in your previous software development roles?
What experience do you have with Spring Boot and how has it contributed to your projects?
Can you discuss a challenging technical problem you encountered in your software development career and how you resolved it?
How do you stay current with the latest trends and advancements in the software development industry?
Have you worked on any collaborative projects with cross-functional teams? If so, how did you ensure effective communication and coordination?
Can you provide an example of a successful software implementation that you were involved in from start to finish?
How do you approach debugging and troubleshooting issues in your code?
In what ways do you prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously in a fast-paced development environment?
How do you ensure the quality and efficiency of your code during the development process?
